website_summaries.verdict: An award-winning daily moisturizer that plumps up your skin for a youthful look.
pros: Formula with Mediterranean algae and Ginkgo Biloba promotes improved skin elasticity
Deep set lines are reducedafter continued use as well as wrinkles
cons: Only has special benefits for mature skin

customer_reviews.title: Elemis Doubled Its Price?
customer_reviews.text: Let's be clear that I love this product but I'm disappointed with how Elemis has doubled its price without thinking anyone would notice. I purchased the 1.7 ounce version six months ago for $65 and then the 3.4 ounce version for around $135 a couple months later. I find they currently aren't offering the larger version but have doubled the price on the 1.7 ounce. This is beyond price gouging. I suggest trying other products until Elemis realizes they can't double the price indiscriminately. A disappointing practice by a company that has excellent products.
customer_reviews.author: RONALD A

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating, yet light and airy
customer_reviews.text: Lately I’ve tried to cut down on my skincare costs, but I’ve come running back to Dior masques and Elemis creams. The best things about Elemis day-time that you can’t find elsewhere are the absorption qualities, how lightweight and airy it feels on skin, and the fact that it never leaves a greasy residue. My face and décolletage drink it in, resulting in softer, toner skin. It’s so much easier to wear a light layer of powder after since it isn’t greasy and actually soaks in. Other, less expensive, creams always make my face shiny like an oil slick and crease my makeup on the few occasions I wear any. Glad I changed back.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra K.

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious!
customer_reviews.text: Pure goodness!!! A+++++++ Love this product! Love my results, too. Reduces crow's feet around my eyes.My aging skin is dry. This helps greatly. Expensive, but lives up to it. My 2nd purchase. 1st one lasted 5-6 months. Don't need to use much. Spreads beautifully. I use it after the facial wash and apricot toner, every morning. The face wash & toner are only 2/3 gone from my 1st purchase at the same time. Happy customer. Aging, mid 60's, and I'm worth it! ❤
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for 3 weeks. No improvement and a waste of 135 dollaes
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Skin Youthful! My Favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this cream for ten years. Takes years off of your face and neck. Not greasy, yet perfect amount of moisture to keep skin soft without the shine. Gives skin a dewy, youthful appearance. Have tried many collagen creams, every price range, and this is the best by far. A little goes a long way, too. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Very much like
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase of Elemis was on a cruise. I would not do that again. It wasnt this product though. it was an oil they were selling on the cruise. I researched this product when returned home and thought I would Give it a try. I on second container now. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the rest of my product?
customer_reviews.text: I opened and there was no seal under cap, and a big chunk of the product is missing. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It has too much oil and the skin feels extremely greasy..
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money, I read the reviews and $100.00 is a lot of money but I believed the reviews, it’s a nice night cream or for under makeup for moisturizer, but as far as helping wrinkles, ha I did not see any difference, using it diligently and no difference for month after month, don’t waste your money cheaper ways to moisturize you skin.
customer_reviews.author: rainy

customer_reviews.title: A Real Cure for Aging
customer_reviews.text: If you want to look good as you age, this cream will not disappoint you. I used the eye duo, the facial serum and then the Marine Cream. People keep telling me how good I look! I'm 70 now, and it doesn't make me look 40, but it makes me look very good for 60 or 65.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Shumaker

customer_reviews.title: Elemis is the winner for Best on market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best moisturizer I’ve ever used. It’s been in my skincare regime for over ten years. It’s a bit pricey but worth it. My skin looks better than most of my friends and my sisters My skin is still soft and moistured at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Jones

customer_reviews.title: Does it deliver
customer_reviews.text: I 1st bought a jar of this while on cruise. It lasted 10 months. I recently bought another jar on Amazon and I still love it. Yes, it's expensive. But if you add up what you spend for OTC beauty products, this is cheaper because it only takes a little and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: winifred anderson

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy....
customer_reviews.text: This product was too heavy for my skin, caused breakouts. My window for refund was closed before I got to tryout the product.
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: nice but for younger people
customer_reviews.text: Really nice cream,,, like the smell of it, it is light... But I am 62yo and though it feels great putting on don't find it does much to help with aging concerns to much.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Tran

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth and luxurious
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for 3 weeks. Very skeptical at first and not certain about giving up a day cream that I have been using for ten years. The silky texture and rapid absorption without any oiliness has given my skin a glow and has made a noticeable difference in minimizing fine lines and wrinkles. Friends have noticed and commented!
customer_reviews.author: marcia corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Excellent face cream.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a number of years. It is not greasy and is quickly absorbed by your skin. The smell is light and fresh. I don’t wear much make up and this is perfect for daytime. I like what it does for my skin and will continue to use it .
customer_reviews.author: Vadarae

customer_reviews.title: Glowing skin after using the first half of the bottle
customer_reviews.text: Learning about this from Instyle magazine which often recommends the best rated cosmetic products and I decided to try. It may not work on all but it does work on me like a magic. I find it more effective than my almost-thousand-dollar skincare one. I love my glowing skin recently and my friends even asked me if I did something to my face or not lol. I’d love to recommend. And I use only the one for daytime because I think the night one could be too much for tropical weather
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Empty container
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cream for the second time because I loved it so much (was saving it for when I Finished my first). Well I opened it up today and it’s empty. Totally empty. Was never filled with cream. I’m so upset. I’m far past the return window because I was waiting to use up my first one. It’s such an expensive purchase, now just wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Berlin

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Was first introduced to this product years ago on a cruise ship. Have be using for about 15 years now. Have had many women ask me what I use because they think I look young? I'll take it. My husband has had dry skin his whole life and I finally convinced him to try it 5 years ago. He won't use anything else. Yes it appears expensive at first glance but a small amount daily does the trick and it feels good going on. Try it you will definitely like it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Fee

customer_reviews.title: It is a lot more expensive than I would normally like to spend but I only have to get a ...
customer_reviews.text: I started to use this a couple of years ago when I received it as a gift, my face has never been the same. I've tired other products and I have not found one that compares. It is a lot more expensive than I would normally like to spend but I only have to get a new one about 9-12 months. It's just the initial expense that makes it seem worse.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha R

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this cream, I had never used anything from this line before, and I have used it every day since I got it. I use it morning and night and I definitely see a big difference in the moisture in my skin....I will definitely order it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not every good products make your skin look better.
customer_reviews.text: A lot if complimentary with this product but not for me ☹️ Everytime I use it, acne all over the face. It’s obvious because I don’t really have acne. Stop using it for a week and reused again but the same side effects. I spent over $200 🤭 I won’t give up so decided to use on my hands hope fully no acne on my hands🤣🧐🧐🤓🤓
customer_reviews.author: saipan

customer_reviews.title: This may be good if the other products had not sucked the oil ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the whole line (gave it to a friend that has extremely oily skin). Dried my face out awfully. This may be good if the other products had not sucked the oil out of my face first. It actually smells good and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Tempest S.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT! This
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about a year now! I LOVE IT! This, along with bliss Peeling Groovy Facial Serum, are my HGs. I was introduced to this on a cruise and I haven't stopped using it since. It makes my skin so smooth and when I have an occasional breakout during that time of the month, it quickly makes it go away. I don't think it will lighten scars. It doesn't make my skin oily even though I have oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Michy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for twenty years. It is amazing. My skin is plump and essentially wrinkle free. I am 68 years old. It has a wonderful creamy feel and glides on your face so smooth. I use morning under makeup and lather it on face and neck before going to bed. It is like giving your face a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Born and Raised Catholic

customer_reviews.title: overpriced and not creamy enough for winter skin
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is all right. It did make a difference with my fine lines and wrinkles, as advertised. But it was not enough once the weather turned cold and I was piling more and more on, to little effect. It cannot be used around the eyes (ask me how I know!). I don't like its scent, but you might not mind. It's not strong, it just isn't "me." It's definitely overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: banjojo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price tag
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this! I waited for it to go on sale and pulled the trigger and bought it. The scent is nice but other than that it’s just meh. I’ve been using it for about 20 days and haven’t noticed anything that my old face cream (Tula) wasn’t doing. I actually feel like my skin looked brighter using Tula. Bottom line is that that it’s not worth the money in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P. Girmscheid

customer_reviews.title: Magic happens
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny, even though I wish is more cheaper. But after 3 days the magic happens. It work, you can feel an see the difference
customer_reviews.author: Muriel Perrier

customer_reviews.title: just love the marine cream it makes my skin feel great
customer_reviews.text: just love the marine cream it makes my skin feel great.I have been using it for two years now. The only thing I don't like is the price it is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It lasts and works wonderfully. I often repurchase on a ship but sometimes ...
customer_reviews.text: Found this cream on a ship many years ago. It lasts and works wonderfully. I often repurchase on a ship but sometimes I run out before the next cruise. Good stuff. Not cheap, but good.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Creasy

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice cream, makes skin feel nice. Skin does not look any different, very expensive. Can buy cheaper creams that make skin feel nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it. Best smell ever.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this moisturizer smells. It smells so fresh. It feels nice on the skin. Expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pirestani

customer_reviews.title: Okay at best
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like reviewers describe. My usual brand Sia is better.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrial

customer_reviews.title: light yet very effective
customer_reviews.text: I love this facial cream. As a 60 year old woman my skin has become dry and areas of sun damage become very brittle. I am always looking for a moisturizer that will keep my skin moist and hydrate especially the areas of sun damage. This product is the best I have found. I have tried every price range and I find this to be the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Did not do anything!
customer_reviews.text: I did not mind spending the $120.00 to purchase this "miracle" cream., however it did not do anything for my fine lines or my skin overall. Disappointing purchase. I should have research it more.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Rinze

customer_reviews.title: Great skin cream
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it! This cream really feels great and absorbs quickly. It hydrates my skin well. It’s my absolute favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Edeen

customer_reviews.title: It works - Try it
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It is a product you have to try for your self to believe how much it works. What the years melt away, I am almost 70 and people have guested my age to be 50. It works! Try it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D Rivard-Hilliker

customer_reviews.title: Moisture delivered!
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer. Its slightly cheaper to order direct but if you order thru Amazon it arrives so much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Smells different than the product I purchased from Spa, but seems to work the same.
customer_reviews.text: My skin is still glowing, so I won't complain. I love the Elemis product line! This was a steal compared to paying spa prices, however I am a bit skeptical by the difference in fragrance compared to my 'spa purchased' Elemis products. I guess the fact that it seems to moisturize the same is a plus:)
customer_reviews.author: hermes corcuera

customer_reviews.title: Works best for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years after it was used on my face at a spa - love it. I have really dry skin and (of all of the other products I have tried in the past) this is the only moisturizer that has worked for me. A little goes a long way - it lasts me 6-7 months - so I didn't mind paying the $128 online or at Nordstrom. I was even more happy when I found it at 1/2 the cost here. Same item - 1/2 the price - no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: G. Sama

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this cream! Just wish it was a little cheaper, but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this since the masseuse used it on a cruise we were on.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaJim

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for several years. It’s a great moisturizer and Is absorbed. Doesn’t’ leave a greasy residue on your skin. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Long

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Got this on a cruise and loved ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Got this on a cruise and loved it. This is my second jar. You only need a little.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife as she was introduced to it at a Spa on our last cruise. This did not come in a box, just warped in some tissue paper so I am hoping this is not grey market or counterfeit. She has some left over from the cruise so when that runs out and she uses this bottle I will know if she thinks it is an original product.
customer_reviews.author: FD Firefighter 121

customer_reviews.title: Best Product Ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product - great moisturizer! Goes on very light, does not feel greasy or heavy. I have been using this product for many years - makes my skin feel great and younger looking! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cream
customer_reviews.text: I had switched from Oil O'Lay afer using it for many years to Elemis Pro- Collagen and their oil capsules. It really works hydrating your skin and removing fine lines on my face. It's a great product I greatly recommend trying it.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful light day time cream
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful light day time cream. I have used it for years. It absorbs in your skin and leaves it so soft, never oily like some moisture creams.
customer_reviews.author: Vadarae

customer_reviews.title: This is the best face cream I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face cream I have ever used. I became acquainted with it on a cruise ship and have loved and used it and other products from Elemis since. Hope you enjoy it as much as I do. A pearl drop is enough to do your entire face.
customer_reviews.author: barbara mason

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I love the consistency of this facial cream. And in combination with the flash balm it is perfect for my skin
customer_reviews.author: Pat Markham

customer_reviews.title: It is the best skin care product I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: It is the best skin care product I ever bought. It is bit pricey but worth it if you can afford it.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: just feel like I cannot live without it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cream for years, just feel like I cannot live without it :)
customer_reviews.author: Dana J.

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out. I would not use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Made me break out. I would not use it for sensitive acne prone skin. But it does make your skin soft.
customer_reviews.author: PeaceE

customer_reviews.title: Used with collegian super elixir. Fine lines seem better
customer_reviews.text: Used with collegian super elixir. Fine lines seem better. Even though product line is expensive I will use for a few months to see results. My skin is very smooth and not dry like it was previously
customer_reviews.author: Monty Michel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this products results and the fragrance plumeria light scent.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: Look you younger
customer_reviews.text: I'm sixty seven years old and have been using elemis at least 30 years I work retail and women can't believe I don't have a wrinkle or that I'm lying about my age goes on light but very hydrating cosmeticians in the store constantly giving me sample of the newest miracle serum or cream for me elemis is the brst
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to Elemis on a Cruise ship a few years ago. I now swear by it. Expensive, yes, but worth every penny. I always look for it on sale. I am in my 50's and am always receiving complements on my skin and lack of fine lines.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t see any results. I was disappointed for how expensive it was.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer ever
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cream for many years now and just love the effects. It has given me a more youthful appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great creme
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replenish the creme I was using. The price was right and due to its size I shouldn't have to order another for some time. Definitely like the accessibility of the product and receiving it so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Routh

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: okay, this stuff is expensive. but it has done great things for my skin -- i have very dry facial skin with fine lines especially around the eyes. Elemis hydrates like nobody's business and my skin shows it. It is remarkably softer.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Crowley

customer_reviews.title: good for the skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product for the skin. I have used this product for about 4 years and like it better than other similar products.
customer_reviews.author: et

customer_reviews.title: Rich and Light Moisture
customer_reviews.text: You only need to use a small dab of this moisturizer so a jar this size ends up lasting for about a year. I love the scent and the fact that it is light and not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Worley

customer_reviews.title: A Cool cream
customer_reviews.text: Like all Elemis products, this cream compliments your face after using the resurfacing facial wash and you can feel the difference in the skin texture after using the pro collagen cream.
customer_reviews.author: Ann S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product lasts all day and makes my skin feel and look great

customer_reviews.title: Best face cream ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face cream ever. Used it on a cruise while having a facial. Loved the product so much that I continue to use it after returning home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the soft, smooth feeling ...
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive but the one thing I will buy for myself throughout the year. I have used this cream for about three years and prefer it above all others. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: A. T. Granmommie

customer_reviews.title: It's an 'okay' facial creme.
customer_reviews.text: Very overpriced for the amount. Has a very pleasant smell. I find that the NutriGena products are better in price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: ImBananas

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer ever.
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, I discovered the Elemis brand at a spa trip on a Holland America cruise. I almost choked when quoted a price for the items I purchased that first time, but without the cruiseline's mark-up, they are far more reasonable when purchased through Amazon. This cream is light as a feather and my skin drinks it up. My combination skin has evened out and my husband often comments on how much softer my skin is since I've been using it. So little is required for daily use, I can easily stretch out a single purchase for an entire year.
customer_reviews.author: Natalee Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Marine cream has improved look and feel of my skin
customer_reviews.text: The marine cream has helped smooth my fine lines and helped fade age spots. I have tried a lot of different creams and found Elemis the best results for me. I have really noticed an over all improvement in the look and feel of my complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pro-Collagen is great
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant to try this $$ cream, but it has been manufactured for 10 years, and decided to give it a try. It hydrates, softens and plumps the skin like most other products only talk about.
customer_reviews.author: snowshoe13

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Relieves dryness and leaves face feeling soft
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Relieves dryness and leaves face feeling soft. Also, no wrinkles if you use it regularly! I've used it daily for 8 months and won't use anything else.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: This is a repeat order because I love the product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

It really works for 24 hours. Also, my face primer goes on smoothly with Elemis just be sure that you have given it time to dry before applying the primer. Although this is expensive, a little goes a long way so I would definitely buy this again.

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have tried many face creams having worked in a big retail store but elemis the best. I have so many surprised looks when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cream for 15 years and will never use anything else . I have tried many face creams having worked in a big retail store but elemis the best. I have so many surprised looks when I tell people how old I am and they always say you don't have a wrinkle on your face and I tell them it's the elemis cream . Light on the face but moisturizing try it
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a jar!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVED IT!!!! Well worth the money... The best purchase you could make for yourself. You need less than a dime size, this stuff will last forever. It comes with a very small measuring spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does not look or smell like the one I have bought from salon
customer_reviews.text: I am questioning the authenticity of the product. It does not look or smell like the one I have bought from salon.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Best cream ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cream. I saw an improvement in my skin quickly. I also wear it under m make-up and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Mil

product_meta.title: ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Marine Cream, Anti-wrinkle Day Cream
product_meta.description:
Size:1.6 Fl OzClinically proven* to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in 14 days, improve hydration and leave skin feeling firmer and looking more radiant. Padina Pavonica, has been blended with Ginkgo Biloba, Chlorella and precious Rose and Mimosa absolutes to moisturise the skin and visibly improve the appearance of fine lines, whilst supporting a feeling of suppleness, firmness and elasticity. This is the ultimate anti-ageing cream from ELEMIS. *Independent clinical trials, 2014-15

BRAND STORY
Luxury British skincare & spa brand that delivers pioneering, clinically trialed therapies & products for face & body.
